basics.name: Sura Baghirova
basics.summary: CEO at Miami Boats Rental | Entrepreneur | Operations Manager | Web Development & Data Analytics | Entrepreneur and dynamic business owner with hands-on experience in digital marketing, web development, customer service, and business management. Successfully managed and grew Miami Boats Rental through strategic marketing and operational excellence, generating significant reservations through social media. Skilled in programming, problem-solving, and analytics, with the ability to quickly adapt to new challenges. Seeking to leverage diverse skills in a dynamic role at a leading tech company. I believe that there's nothing you can't learn if you truly want to, and no matter how much you know, there's always something more to attain.

education.institution: International Prague University, Prague, Czech Republic

highlights: Currently working remote for an IT service provider based in Canada to help manage Alert Software and their IT projects. My responsibilities include adding employee’s work timesheet to the system, signing tasks for each of team member, making sure tasks has been completed, creating invoices in Alert Software and importing them to the QuickBooks. Tracking the BMC remedy action request system - for availability of new CRQ, TAS, INC.

work.position: Traffic Coordinator / Data Coordinator / ERP assistant / Website Manager
highlights: Joined the team as a Traffic Coordinator and grew to become the Product Specialist for our biggest client “Diamond CBD” It was my job to communicate with manufacturing while client managing data and updating products to coordinate with designers for design and digital rendering of products. I was also creating and controlling SKU, UPCs and QR codes for labels. As a product specialist I start to work with their ERP system in the “Odoo”. I published products and updates to the website while managing the wholesale inventory and retail system. I also optimized client’s sites for SEO, making sure Meta titles and meta descriptions were attached for all products, pages, articles and images.
